original_text: When they had departed from him, leaving him severely wounded, his servants conspired against him because of the blood of the son of Jehoiada the priest, and killed him on his bed. So he died, and they buried him in the city of David, but they did not bury him in the tombs of the kings.
korean_text: 요아스가 크게 부상하매 적군이 그를 버리고 간 후에 그의 신하들이 제사장 여호야다의 아들들의 피로 말미암아 반역하여 그를 그의 침상에서 쳐죽인지라 다윗 성에 장사하였으나 왕들의 묘실에는 장사하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: When they had departed from him
because of the blood of the son of Jehoiada the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 제사장 여호야다의 아들의 피 때문이었으며

sentences.original_text: and killed him on his bed
and they buried him in the city of David
but they did not bury him in the tombs of the kings
